ingredients: 2 cups quick-cooking oats, 1 cup shredded coconut,   +   1/4 cup unsweetened cocoa powder, 2 cups white sugar,   +   1/2 cup butter,   +   1/2 cup milk
nutrition: Total Fat 9g 11%, Saturated Fat 6g 28%, Cholesterol 17mg 6%, Sodium 62mg 3%, Total Carbohydrate 38g 14%, Dietary Fiber 2g 8%, Total Sugars 29g, Protein 2g, Calcium 20mg 2%, Iron 1mg 4%, Potassium 93mg 2%
